sentences: Üksikute prassijate vembud heidavad halba varju kõigile tudengitele.
Lapsed ei tohtinud vanematele halba varju heita.
Võivad tekkida kuulujutud, heidan noore tüdruku heale nimele varju.
context: In Estonian, 'halba' is the partitive singular form of the adjective 'halb'. It's commonly used in the phrase 'halba varju heita' which means 'to cast a bad shadow' or figuratively 'to discredit' someone. The word appears to have connotations of bringing negative attention or tarnishing someone's reputation.
